Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Feedback from teacher was limited to few general points but it gives a perspective on what they expect for a particular assignment. 
Feedback from AI was precise as I could ask as many questions as I want and dig deeper with my own space and time. Giving me my freedom to explore deeper into feedback without time restrictions we might have with faculties.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not really. Both has different impact as explained before.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Nothing much, I have explained in the previous questions.
